headline: CVI TM-500 LN2 CRYOGENIC VACUUM PUMP
keywords: cryogenci vacuum pumps  cryo pumps  cryos  helium pumps
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Cryopumps
specstable:
Manufacturer CVI
Model TM-500 LN2
Inlet Flange ASA 508.0 mm (20.000 in)
Pumping Speed Nitrogen 10,500.0 l/s (22,250.5 CFM)
Pumping Speed Water Vapor 30,000.00 l/s (63,572.79 CFM)
Pumping Speed Argon 8,500.00 l/s (18,012.29 CFM)
Cooldown Time 210 Minutes
Other Information Cryogenic Compressor and hoses not included. Please inquire about availability.
Exterior Dimensions
Width 28.000 in (71.1 cm)
Depth 28.000 in (71.1 cm)
Height 27.000 in (68.6 cm)
Weight 214 lb (97 kg)
